aboutView.section2_text: We offer our customers high-quality, reliable and user-friendly software solutions without sacrificing innovation and modern technologies. SOFT IT develops software applications and platforms that allow users to intelligently edit, organize, backup or share photos, videos and music. Our company is engaged in the implementation of more than 20 successful projects in the field of Digitization, as well as their technical support and implementation of quality software. About 20 highly qualified project managers, full stack programmers, testers, UI/UX and graphic designers work in our company.
